name: THINKsubscription
overview: THINK Subscription offers total subscription life-cycle management software to help organizations grow subscriber loyalty and engagement. The THINK Enterprise Software platform is designed to facilitate, in real-time, subscription billing, payments, marketing and more, all into one centralized system, saving time, effort and money. THINK Subscription solutions allow you manage and monetize any subscription type you offer so you can leverage your most powerful asset, in an efficient and scalable way. Through THINK Subscription reporting capabilities you’ll have a centralized monitoring system with real-time access to all the key metrics and data you need to grow your business. By keeping a pulse on how your subscribers are really doing, you’ll be able to see key drivers revealing precise actions to grow engagement subscriber loyalty and increase revenue. THINK Subscription’s robust solutions and professional services combine to help businesses capitalize on total subscription management. For more information about THINK Subscription visit http://www.thinksubscription.com.
